description:
When I just checked out the latest code and ran .run_tests.sh -p for cinder, it yielded the result:

=====================================================
No virtual environment found...create one? (Y/n) n
Running PEP8 and HACKING compliance check...
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "tools/hacking.py", line 389, in <module>
    pep8._main()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pep8.py", line 1346, in _main
    runner(path)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pep8.py", line 1027, in input_file
    errors = Checker(filename).check_all()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pep8.py", line 968, in check_all
    self.check_logical()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pep8.py", line 925, in check_logical
    offset, text = result
ValueError: need more than 0 values to unpack
=======================================================
title: pep8 unable to work

comments.content:
When I just checked out the latest code and ran .run_tests.sh -p for cinder, it yielded the result:

=====================================================
No virtual environment found...create one? (Y/n) n
Running PEP8 and HACKING compliance check...
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "tools/hacking.py", line 389, in <module>
    pep8._main()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pep8.py", line 1346, in _main
    runner(path)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pep8.py", line 1027, in input_file
    errors = Checker(filename).check_all()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pep8.py", line 968, in check_all
    self.check_logical()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pep8.py", line 925, in check_logical
    offset, text = result
ValueError: need more than 0 values to unpack
=======================================================
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~houshengbo

comments.content:
Hey Vincent,
I've run in to this on a couple of Ubuntu systems myself, but I'm reluctant to call it a bug against Cinder or Nova.  It's actually a missing or difference in a package when you're trying to set up the non-virtual environment.  The Venv works fine, and if I use Pips where the Venv uses Pips, etc I don't seem to have this issue.

Take a closer look, but I think this is invalid, but we may want to sort it out and update the developers setup guide to cover it when we have a clear answer.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~john-griffith

comments.content: I suspect this is a dev environment setup issue.  I can help Vincent get things sorted, but given that Jenkins runs appropriately and building venv and running works as expected I don't think this is a bug against the project.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~john-griffith

comments.content:
I've seen the same on all fresh Precise Ubuntu with devstack install.
You can overcome it by running tests in virtual environment. BUT, virt env has another bug - pep8 is not listed in pip requires file - you need to add it there manually.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vladimir.p
